verses.roman:
rāya kahe,--"kaha sahaja-premera lakṣaṇa"
rūpa-gosāñi kahe,--"sāhajika prema-dharma"

synonyms: rāya kahe—Śrīla Rāmānanda Rāya inquires; kaha—please tell me; sahaja-premera—of natural love; lakṣaṇa—the characteristics; rūpa-gosāñi kahe—Rūpa Gosvāmī replies; sāhajika—spontaneous; prema-dharma—character of love of Godhead.
translation: Rāmānanda Rāya further inquired, "What are the natural characteristics of awakening love of Godhead?" Rūpa Gosvāmī replied, "These are the natural characteristics of love of God.
